[{"id":"45","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"D\u1ecaCH V\u1ee4 L\u1eaeP \u0110\u1eb6T TR\u1eccN G\u00d3I KH\u00d3A \u0110I\u1ec6N T\u1eec D\u00c0NH CHO H\u1ec6 TH\u1ed0NG KH\u00c1CH S\u1ea0N, KHU NGH\u1ec8 D\u01af\u1ee0NG, CHUNG C\u01af, CAO \u1ed0C V\u0102N PH\u00d2NG, KHU LI\u00caN\/PH\u1ee8C H\u1ee2P","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"<p>L\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t&nbsp;c&aacute;c lo\u1ea1i Kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed [Wifi\/Bluetooth - V&acirc;n tay - M\u1eadt m&atilde;&nbsp;- Th\u1ebb t\u1eeb - Ch&igrave;a c\u01a1] t\u1ea1i nh&agrave; ph\u1ed1 \/ chung c\u01b0 \/ khu ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \/ kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \/ d\u1ef1 &aacute;n l\u1edbn nh\u1ecf.<\/p>","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<div><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><strong><span style=\"color:#2c3e50;\"><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span>\r\n<p><span arial=\"\" style=\"font-family:\"><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed kh&ocirc;ng c&ograve;n xa l\u1ea1 \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi ti&ecirc;u d&ugrave;ng t\u1ea1i th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng Vi\u1ec7t Nam. Hi\u1ec7n nay, kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111ang l&agrave; s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 thay th\u1ebf c&aacute;c d&ograve;ng kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng. L\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u g&igrave;? Quy tr&igrave;nh l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed di\u1ec5n ra nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n&agrave;o? H&atilde;y c&ugrave;ng OBT VN tham kh\u1ea3o ngay b&agrave;i vi\u1ebft d\u01b0\u1edbi \u0111&acirc;y:<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng c&ocirc;ng ngh\u1ec7 hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i c&ugrave;ng nh\u1eefng t&iacute;nh n\u0103ng th&ocirc;ng minh, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd \u0111em \u0111\u1ebfn kh&ocirc;ng gian s\u1ed1ng tho\u1ea3i m&aacute;i, ti\u1ec7n nghi v\u1edbi m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 an ninh v&agrave; b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt h\u01a1n bao gi\u1edd h\u1ebft.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"320\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/residential-locksmith-services.jpg\" width=\"480\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n<\/div>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"> <strong>L\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ea7n y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u g&igrave;?<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/strong><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Vi\u1ec7c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed&nbsp;c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn. B\u1edfi ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n sai s&oacute;t m\u1ed9t ch&uacute;t l&agrave; c&oacute; th\u1ec3 l&agrave;m kh&oacute;a b\u1ecb l\u1ec7ch, kh&ocirc;ng l\u1eafp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh&oacute;a ho\u1eb7c t\u1ec7 h\u01a1n l&agrave; h\u1ecfng lu&ocirc;n c\u1ea3 c&aacute;nh c\u1eeda. Do \u0111&oacute;, khi l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o hai y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u quan tr\u1ecdng sau:<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<ol>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">X&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ed9 d&agrave;y c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda: d&ugrave; l&agrave; c\u1eeda s\u1eaft, c\u1eeda k&iacute;nh, c\u1eeda g\u1ed7 hay c\u1eeda nh\u1ef1a gi\u1ea3 g\u1ed7, \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda ph\u1ea3i c&oacute; \u0111\u1ed9 d&agrave;y t\u1ed1i thi\u1ec3u t\u1eeb 35-40mm m\u1edbi c&oacute; th\u1ec3 l\u1eafp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh&oacute;a.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n\t<li><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">X&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ed9 r\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda: \u0111\u1ed9 r\u1ed9ng ti&ecirc;u chu\u1ea9n c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ea1t t\u1eeb 95-100mm. L\u01b0u &yacute;, c\u1ea7n tr\u1eeb \u0111i ph\u1ea7n ch\u1ec9 c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1 c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 c&oacute; k&iacute;ch th\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111o ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c nh\u1ea5t.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/li>\r\n<\/ol>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p c\u1eeda c\u1ee7a qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch kh&ocirc;ng \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng nh\u1eefng y&ecirc;u c\u1ea7u tr&ecirc;n th&igrave; qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch kh&ocirc;ng n&ecirc;n c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t. Thay v&agrave;o \u0111&oacute;, h&atilde;y tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp li&ecirc;n h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi c&aacute;c \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda chuy&ecirc;n nghi\u1ec7p nh\u01b0 OBT.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\"><span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">OBT mang t\u1edbi d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda chuy&ecirc;n nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o t&iacute;nh th\u1ea9m m\u1ef9 v&agrave; b\u1ec1n \u0111\u1eb9p cho c&aacute;nh c\u1eeda.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><strong><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Quy tr&igrave;nh l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed t\u1ea1i OBT<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/strong><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">B\u01b0\u1edbc 1: \u0110&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u v&agrave; x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ecb tr&iacute; l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ti&ecirc;n, \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt vi&ecirc;n t\u1eeb OBT s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh v&agrave; \u0111&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u ch&iacute;nh x&aacute;c v\u1ecb tr&iacute; l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t b\u1ed9 ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a l&ecirc;n c\u1eeda. Ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a l&agrave; &ldquo;tr&aacute;i tim&rdquo; c\u1ee7a c\u1ea3 b\u1ed9 kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda, do \u0111&oacute; ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec3 qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh v\u1eadn h&agrave;nh c\u1ee7a kh&oacute;a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c di\u1ec5n ra tr\u01a1n tru nh\u1ea5t.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">B\u01b0\u1edbc 2: Ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh khoan \u0111\u1ee5c v&agrave; ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda cho c\u1eeda<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">\u1ede b\u01b0\u1edbc n&agrave;y, ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t kh&oacute;a c\u1eeda theo \u0111&uacute;ng c&aacute;c v\u1ecb tr&iacute; \u0111&atilde; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111&aacute;nh d\u1ea5u. Ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i s\u1ebd cho ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a v&agrave;o khu&ocirc;n \u0111&uacute;c, k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t v\u1eeba kh&iacute;t v&agrave;o b&ecirc;n trong c\u1eeda, qua \u0111&oacute; \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ed9 ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn v&agrave; kh&ocirc;ng b\u1ecb k&ecirc;nh cho ru\u1ed9t kh&oacute;a. <span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">B\u01b0\u1edbc 3: Ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t, h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch c&aacute;ch thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp v&agrave; s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span style=\"font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;\">Sau khi ho&agrave;n t\u1ea5t l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t, k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt vi&ecirc;n c\u1ee7a OBT s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfn h&agrave;nh l\u1eafp pin v&agrave; ki\u1ec3m tra c&aacute;c ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng c\u1ee7a kh&oacute;a. Khi th\u1ea5y qu&aacute; tr&igrave;nh \u0111&oacute;ng\/m\u1edf c\u1ee7a c\u1eeda di\u1ec5n ra \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh, qu&yacute; kh&aacute;ch s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn c&aacute;ch thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp c&aacute;c ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c&aacute;ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 nh\u1ea5t. T\u1ed5ng th\u1eddi gian t&iacute;nh t\u1eeb l&uacute;c x&aacute;c \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ecb tr&iacute; l\u1eafp v&agrave; ho&agrave;n thi\u1ec7n l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t l&agrave; t\u1eeb 1.5-2 ti\u1ebfng.<span style=\"line-height:107%\"><\/span><\/span><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\r\n<figure class=\"image\" style=\"display:inline-block\"><img alt=\"\"
